_sText:
Epsilon version contains the long wished anti staller function
Also the bug got wixed with stacking healnades in sex cage.

Anti Stall:
if someone enters a secret nade room. you have 40 sec to get the nade or the room will get disabled means all inside will die. After the first player enters the a secred nade room: Teleport gets disabled after 20 sec

after 120sec: a fire tornade spawns scorching through the map and kills all that touch it. Secret nade rooms get disabled too.
If someone goes to 1. Boss and dont enter the Warp to boss. He automatic die in 20 sec

This is just to prevent from noobs that want destroy your server by stalling and camping at save locations

2. Boss sephiroth is now enterable without T needet

Delta version contains some wishes from other people:

Addet tons of secrets
Addet more funny stuff
Addet drugs: Shrooms and Extasy
No death when falling out of Boss train anymore

This were most wishes from other people so if you want something special let it me known

New fixed version now

Fix2:

Fixed some sound bugs
Fixed a Bug where you could get a weapon before entering a minigame
Changed Blue red Pillar trap

Fixes: 
T dont spawn in bossroom now
Addet heal before you enter boss (you have full Hp now when attemt a Bossfight)
Some lights addet

Added some funny secret you can do as CT in the room where you choose the minigame

My 4. Map and maybe last deathrun map
